h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Apramana Bat
content: With both of them down, you'll find that they were guarding a **Luojia Fragrant Vine** , which you can now bring back to the Zodiac Village instead of going all the way back to Chapter 1!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Apramana Bat'.
The content is as follows:
With both of them down, you'll find that they were guarding a **Luojia Fragrant Vine** , which you can now bring back to the Zodiac Village instead of going all the way back to Chapter 1!
